definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

sentences.english: The drifting people of Baekje are precisely produces under this historical perspective.
sentences.chinese: 百济遗民正是在此历史背景下出现的。

sentences.english: By way of an introduction, I'd just like to give some historical background for this issue.
sentences.chinese: 作为开场白，我来解释一下这件事的历史背景。

sentences.english: The second chapter elaborates the Baekje drifting people related to the historical background.
sentences.chinese: 第二章论述百济遗民相关的历史背景。

sentences.english: In this paper, the first chapter primarily analyzes the historical background of the hippy movement.
sentences.chinese: 论文第一章主要分析嬉皮士运动发生的历史背景。

sentences.english: The special historical context makes the pottery figures collected by Lvshun Museum have un- usual characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 特殊的历史背景使得旅顺博物馆所藏人俑极具特色。

sentences.english: Harout, the host showed the map while analyzing the historical background of Israel and Palestina.
sentences.chinese: 主持人哈鲁特用地图讲解了以巴冲突的历史背景。

sentences.english: The first part of the historical background of the Mukden Incident.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分为九一八事变的历史背景。

sentences.english: Let me give you a brief historical perspective on today’s health challenges.
sentences.chinese: 让我向你们简要地介绍一下当今卫生挑战的历史背景。

sentences.english: These issues have both complicated historical background and many practical reasons.
sentences.chinese: 这些问题既有复杂的历史背景，也有诸多的现实原因。

sentences.english: First, examining the reasons of the history background of Wu's art coming into being.
sentences.chinese: 吴冠中艺术观产生的历史背景因素。

sentences.english: Chapter I, the historical background of Seneca"s three essays."
sentences.chinese: 第一章，塞涅卡三论的历史背景。

sentences.english: They advanced the theory of the mean in similar historical background.
sentences.chinese: 在相似的历史背景下，他们提出了“中庸”思想。

sentences.english: Colander emphasizes the intellectual and historical context to which the economic models are applied.
sentences.chinese: 科兰德强调知识和历史背景的经济模式的应用。

sentences.english: Giving the name "honoring brothers" to Taiwan's seventh month Pudu rite has its own special historical background.
sentences.chinese: 台湾七月普渡称为拜好兄弟实有其特殊的历史背景。

sentences.english: The first chapter reveals the historical background of Hanseatic merchants entering into Britain.
sentences.chinese: 第一章论述汉萨商人进入英国的历史背景。

sentences.english: The historical background of Chinese literary theory is the introduction of Western modernity into China in the last few decades of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪晚期中国文论的历史背景是现代性西学东渐。

definition: evolution of sth over time/course of development/history
modern history (for China, from the Opium Wars until the fall of the Qing Dynasty, i.e. mid-19th to early 20th century)
the characteristics and circumstances particular to a country/current state of a country
a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties)/age/era/period/CL:個|个[ge4]
